title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Migrate and Modernize Legacy Workflows to Intelligent Agents (PEX304)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 将传统工作流迁移和现代化为智能代理 (PEX304)
abstract: This session explores transforming legacy workflows into intelligent agent-based systems. Learn to assess, design, build, and run autonomous agents that modernize rigid, siloed processes into adaptive, AI-powered solutions. Understand essential design considerations and frameworks for scaling agentic implementations. Through demonstrations, discover practical strategies using Model Context Protocol (MCP) and specialized domain agents, including a comprehensive reference architecture leveraging AWS Gen AI services and Strands SDK for enterprise-grade agentic systems. Learn how AWS partners can build agentic offerings using structured frameworks to accelerate customers' modernization journeys through innovative solutions that deliver business value.
abstract_cn: 本课程探讨如何将传统工作流转变为基于智能代理的系统。学习评估、设计、构建和运行自主代理，将僵化、孤立的流程现代化为自适应的AI驱动解决方案。了解扩展代理实施的基本设计考量和框架。通过演示，探索使用模型上下文协议(MCP)和专业领域代理的实用策略，包括利用AWS生成式AI服务和Strands SDK构建企业级代理系统的综合参考架构。了解AWS合作伙伴如何使用结构化框架构建代理产品，通过提供业务价值的创新解决方案加速客户的现代化进程。
